Actions.Text: REFERRED TO VETERANS, HOMELAND SECURITY AND MILITARY AFFAIRS
REFERRED TO VETERANS, HOMELAND SECURITY AND MILITARY AFFAIRS

Title: Enacts the "NY Cares Act", providing course credit for service members and tuition awards for spouses and children of deceased service members
Summary: Enacts the "NY Cares Act", providing course credit for service members and tuition awards for spouses and children of deceased service members.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the education law, in relation to enacting the "NY Cares Act"
